name: detect_offensive_message
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool offensive_user_comment_detection.
Tool description: This API uses natural language processing and machine learning to detect and flag inappropriate or offensive comments in multiple languages, helping to create a safer online environment and assist moderators in taking appropriate action.
API description: Detects hate speech and offensive language in the provided message using the specified API key.
